title: Why Does The Shower Get Hot When The Toilet Is Flushed?
itunes:title: Why Does The Shower Get Hot When The Toilet Is Flushed?
description:
Were you burned the last time someone flushed the toilet while you were showering? It's a simple plumbing fix.
